content.rendered:
Our Client, an exciting start-up in Durham, is seeking a candidate to support cell isolation, extraction, and expansion activities.  The technologist may also assist with donor recruitment, collection, transportation, processing, product release, and quality assurance activities. The position requires a high level of attention to detail, and manual dexterity.  Rigorous training, competency assessment and proficiency testing will be a part of the process.

Minimum requirements include:

  • Bachelor’s degree in a scientific discipline. Biomedical Engineering degree is highly preferred.
  • Hands-on experience in cell biology, cell banking, and cell manufacturing.
  • Working knowledge of GTP/GMP regulations.
  • Understanding of quality is a huge plus.
  • Experience with cord blood and/or cell therapy is desired, but not required.
  • Demonstrated ability to multitask and take initiative.
